ygData.subject: Re: Webpages
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Not really any good ones, but Soerbaird.com, who hosts the Shaman s Crucible (an awesome shaman site), is branching off to each of the other classes, and I
ygData.messageBody:
rich.hitz@... wrote:
>
> From: rich.hitz@...
>
> Any good SK webpages out there?
> Thanks in advance.
>

Not really any good ones, but Soerbaird.com, who hosts the
Shaman's Crucible (an awesome shaman site), is branching off
to each of the other classes, and I am contributing alot of info
to them to get the SK part up. I've sent in a complete spell and
skill list, and an in-depth spell guide for the first three ranks.
I will likely have 2 other guides done before he can get the site
ready, and those will be Using your Pet, and a general SK tactics
guide. I am debating about the quests I know about. Perhaps I
will compile a list of quests, and how to get started, but not
a full spoiler, but maybe not.

Xilith T'Vyn <Obsidian Knights>
26th SK, Tunare
